Articles.Content:
Prepare deployment of the Exahelix compressor.

Start firing now!

[Very well. Aboard Voyager, how many ways are there to do anything?? 3. The right way, the wrong way, and the Janeway.

No no, that was bad. Okay, how many ears does Jim Kirk have? 3; A right ear, a left ear, and a final frontier]

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-15T18:58:42Z" title="07/15/2015 06:58  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 15, 2015</time> by Xannari Ferrows**

The Venusian empire expands and seizes control of the Orion's Arm. They then take over the Magellanic Clouds and establish an economy and army.

They begin development on the KOD, a super-weapon capable of decimating the Krynn with extreme effectiveness.

Still no response to the surrender terms.

(The Krynn have no sense of humor, so this might overload their brains!)

- - - Updated - - -

The Armada is on its way. We have full Phase shields, Particle shields, Quantum shields, and a magnetic shield that was found in Sampa's backyard. There is also a outer shield protecting the entire Armada.

- - - Updated - - -

Why did the chicken cross the road?

The KOD was deployed on Regenixia-14 b, a Krynn colony, and proved to work just as advertiesed: Long tendrils of nanobots form a web-like expansion into the planet's underground, picking off Krynn buildings and units like Grey Goo.

Regenixia-14 b is now under our control, and holds vast amounts of metal ore.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-15T19:01:54Z" title="07/15/2015 07:01  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 15, 2015</time> by Souper**

> 
> They begin development on the KOD, a super-weapon capable of decimating the Krynn with extreme effectiveness.

[i'm curious as to how this works. Explanation?]

[EDIT: You ninja darn you. Even so, how do you plan to get them past the shields?]

> 
> Prepare deployment of the Exahelix compressor.
> Start firing now!
> 
> [Very well. Aboard Voyager, how many ways are there to do anything?? 3. The right way, the wrong way, and the Janeway.
> 
> No no, that was bad. Okay, how many ears does Jim Kirk have? 3; A right ear, a left ear, and a final frontier]

That is a pun, not a joke. And it came from a human. The joke must come from the Krynn collective

- - - Updated - - -

Autocorrect is being weird on my computer

> 
> That is a pun, not a joke. And it came from a human. The joke must come from the Krynn collective

[Details details, fine. ...What do you do when the Krynn approach? I thought that would've been obvious. You Krynnge]

> 
> The KOD was deployed on Regenixia-14 b, a Krynn colony, and proved to work just as advertiesed: Long tendrils of nanobots form a web-like expansion into the planet's core, picking off Krynn buildings and units like Grey Goo.
> Regenixia-14 b is now under our control, and holds vast amounts of metal ore.

I can get past those shields. All I need is a shell of electrified Titanium with a rotating Kinemet sphere inside. Then we need the frequency of the Krynn shield so we can upload it in the device, which is on the *Discovery*Ã¢â‚¬â€¹.

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> [Details details, fine. ...What do you do when the Krynn approach? I thought that would've been obvious. You Krynnge]

Again, from a human (Did she have any humanity to begin with? Hmmm....)
The Venusian Empire begins amassing huge amounts of shield disruptors and KODs, preparing to augment Laythe Dweller's forces.
(Hey, i'm back.)

*Fire all you like. You will drain yourself of resources, and then what? Will you stand and keep fighting? Even if you run, you cannot run forever.*

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-15T19:07:30Z" title="07/15/2015 07:07  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 15, 2015</time> by Xannari Ferrows**

Kinemetic missile production is at an all time high, and all are ready to fire upon the Krynn as soon as the shield is down

COMPUTER: KRYNN FREQUENCY AQUIRED. ERROR. FREQUENCY CHANGED. ERROR FREQUENCY CHANGED. ERROR

> 
> (Hey, i'm back.)

[Oh goodie! Just dealing with some meddlers here. *Or rather we are.* Not exactly sure how they'll handle the regenerative and reactive properties of our shield, and regenerative properties of the hull itself]

The Venusian empire expands into the Sloan Great Wall, claiming every single galaxy in it for itself and becoming a superpower. It begins development on extremely advanced (bleeding-edge) technology that would totally crush the Krynn is used.

> 
> The Venusian empire expands into the Sloan Great Wall, claiming every single galaxy in it for itself and becoming a superpower. It begins development on extremely advanced (bleeding-edge) technology that would totally crush the Krynn is used.

[That's quite a leap to make. Is there a reason for your claims?]
Fill me in on what has happened

So in a few posts, you conquer half the universe?? It took me several posts to even discover Kinemet, let alone weaponize it.

- - - Updated - - -

The key is curing Xannari. She would know everything about the Krynn.

[That move will be another 5 posts until total colonization of the Sloan Great Wall is completed, and an indeterminate time until the tech becomes available. Stop us right now or face certain obliteration.]

> 
> Fill me in on what has happened

[i'm still here. I'm still fighting]
Hmmm... I have an idea... Sampa, still got those samples of the infections T-Cells?

> 
> [i'm still here. I'm still fighting]

 you still with the krynn or our side?
With the Krynn

> 
> you still with the krynn or our side?

[i'm still one with the Krynn right now. They're using my enhanced visual acuity as the center and basis of targeting]

> 
> Hmmm... I have an idea... Sampa, still got those samples of the infections T-Cells?

\*Whispers\* affirmative, trying to locate xannari, we need to take her down.

(2 1/2 hours later) Aha! I have it. I retrofitted this phaser to fire an electromagnetic pulse that rips through all infections T-Cells that cause the disease. All we need to do is find Xannari and shoot her with it, and it will restore her to normal!

- - - Updated - - -

Now to get aboard that ship.
